name: America: Our Defining Hours

next_episode_to_air.name: A New Beginning
next_episode_to_air.overview: From the very beginning, America is a nation shaped by adversity. These are the stories of the challenges that helped shape a nation. How our forebears survive the "starving time" of the first colonies; battle their mother country for independence; head out to the frontier and west into the unknown; and spark a resistance to slavery that brings the United States to the brink of civil war.

overview: Americans have faced adversity before—overcoming it is baked into the nation’s DNA.
